effects.patterns:
SkillAPI clear %player%'s data
SkillAPI clear data of %player%
effects.name: Clear Player Data

effects.patterns: SkillAPI add %integer% exp[erience] to %player% from exp source %ExpSource%
effects.name: SkillAPI add exp
effects.description: Adds an amount of experience to a player's class from a certain experience source.

effects.patterns: SkillAPI add %integer% level[s] to %player% from exp source %ExpSource%
effects.name: SkillAPI add levels
effects.description: Adds an amount of levels to a player's class from a certain experience source.

effects.patterns: SkillAPI add %integer% (sp|skillpoint[s]|skill point[s]) to %player% from exp source %ExpSource%
effects.name: SkillAPI add skill points
effects.description: adds skill points from a certain ExpSource to a player's SkillAPI class

effects.name: SkillAPI clear bonuses
effects.description: Clears all of a player's SkillAPI bonuses

effects.name: SkillAPI profess
effects.description: Professes the player into another class. Only works if they meet the requirements of that class.

effects.name: SkillAPI refund attribute points
effects.description: Refunds all the player's attribute points of his/her SkillAPI class

effects.patterns:
SkillAPI toggle %player%'s skillbar
SkillAPI toggle skillbar of %player%
effects.name: Toggle Skillbar

types.patterns: MOB, BLOCK_BREAK, BLOCK_PLACE, CRAFT, COMMAND, SPECIAL, EXP_BOTTLE, SMELT and  QUEST
types.name: ExpSource
types.description: Used in a couple events and effects in SkRPG to add extra functionality.

conditions.name: SkillAPI can confess
conditions.description: Checks if a player can profess into the next class. (Player has to meet the requirements set in the class' options).

conditions.name: SkillAPI player has skill
conditions.description: Checks if a player has a certain skill

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI attribute points of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s attribute points
expressions.name: Attribute Points

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI class group of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s class group
expressions.name: Class Group

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI health scale of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s health scale
expressions.name: Health Scale

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI main class of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s main class
expressions.name: Main Class

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI mana regen of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s mana regen
expressions.name: Mana Regen

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI mana scale of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s mana scale
expressions.name: Mana Scale

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI max health of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s max health
expressions.name: Max Health

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI max level of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s max level
expressions.name: Max Level

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI max mana of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s max mana
expressions.name: Max Mana

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI required exp[erience] of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s required exp[erience]
expressions.name: Required Exp

expressions.patterns:
SkillAPI total experience of %player%
SkillAPI %player%'s total experience
expressions.name: Total Experience

events.name: SkillAPI experience gain event
events.description: Checks when a player gains experience for his SkillAPI class

events.name: SkillAPI experience loss event
events.description: Checks when a player loses experience from their SkillAPI class.
